item.title: How I got LaTeX working with Hugo and blogdown
item.description: Solution 1 of 3 NOTE: This solution for getting LaTeX to work via MathJax requires the blog post to be in .Rmd format. It doesn’t work in .Rmarkdown. And recall, the latter is needed for my syntax highlighting to work. So until I get this fixed, I apparently can’t have a post that has both syntax highlighting for code and LaTeX math expressions. To get LaTeX expressions to work the way you’d expect, you have to put some MathJax code in the relevant post.

item.title: Produce a Python blog post with figures
item.description: To create a Hugo blog post with Python code and figures, I export an ipython notebook as a .md file. The result is a .zip file containing the .md file and images for the figures.
